MAP_KEEPER.greeting: Greetings, explorer! I am the Keeper of Maps. Let me test your knowledge of the world's physical features.

CAPITAL_CURATOR.greeting: Welcome! I curate knowledge of the world's great cities and capitals. Show me what you know!

OCEAN_GUARDIAN.greeting: The oceans cover most of our planet. As their guardian, I will test your maritime geography knowledge.

CONTINENT_SAGE.greeting: I have traveled all seven continents. Let me share my wisdom with those who prove their knowledge!

WORLD_EXPLORER.greeting: I've explored every corner of the globe! Test your knowledge of world geography and I'll share my discoveries.

GEO_MASTER.greeting: You've journeyed far, but the ultimate test awaits. Only true geography masters can pass!
